title: HelpPlz
description: A node executable for searching documentation, Google, npm, and Stack Overflow

title: Screenshotta
description: A python script for easy screenshotting

title: Pomodoro App
description: Preact PWA pomodoro clock to help my reverse ADD.

title: Smart Mirror
description: Mirror that displays stock tickers, calendar, weather, and news from top papers. (And my pretty face)

title: HODLCON
description: The official DEFCON but for cryptocurrencies. (Really just a list of hacks in the space.)

title: Favoritify
description: A Web App that allows you to see your favorite Spotify music (artists, genres, and tracks, audio features) over three time periods.

title: Nokiacoin
description: A twitter bot that tweets the current price of BTC in terms of Nokia cellphone models

title: Standing Desk
description: A little stand to let me stand
